description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/create-a-new-client-key/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/create-a-new-client-key/)

Create a new client key bound to a project. The key's secret and public key are generated by the server.

### Path Parameters

`organization_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the organization the client keys belong to.

`project_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the project the client keys belong to.

### Body Parameters

`name` *(string)*REQUIRED

The name for the new key.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `project:write`
